titles.title: SF215 See, amid the winter's snow

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
See, amid the winter's snow,
born for us on earth below,
see, the Lamb of God appears,
promised from eternal years!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hail, the ever-blessed morn!
Hail, redemption's happy dawn!
Sing through all Jerusalem:
Christ is born in Bethlehem!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lo, within a manger lies
he who built the starry skies,
he who, throned in height sublime,
sits amid the cherubim!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Say, you holy shepherds, say,
what your joyful news today;
why then have you left your sheep
on the lonely mountain steep?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
'As we watched at dead of night,
lo, we saw a wondrous light:
angels, singing "Peace on earth,"
told us of the Saviour's birth.'

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sacred infant, holy child,
tender love so pure and mild
comes from heaven's highest bliss
down to such a world as this!
